layout.title: Levy Nkeneng's Portfolio

Developed custom plugins and themes to enhance functionality and user experience.
Collaborated with designers to implement responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.

projects.title: GamersWorld
description: A Symfony-based web application created for playing simple games.
Supports Tic-Tac-Toe, Rock-Paper-Scissors, and other casual games.
Offers multiple modes: Solo play, AI opponent, or online matches against other players.
Symfony & PHP are used to handle server requests efficiently.
Messenger manages asynchronous tasks such as email dispatching.
Mercure is utilized for real-time one-way communication between clients and the server.
Files are served via the Caddy server, ensuring fast and secure delivery.
FrankenPHP runs in worker mode, optimizing PHP processing for high performance.

projects.title: ApiTester.JS
description: A Node.js-based tool designed for quickly sending requests to an endpoint.
Supports both HTTP and Server-Sent Events (SSE) for versatile testing.
Useful for testing endpoints during development or analyzing response structures.
Allows sending requests with both text-based and file-based bodies.
Provides flexibility in simulating different API interactions.

projects.title: Blitz Task
description: A task management application built with React, Vite.js, and TypeScript.
Task Management is powered by PHP and Symfony, ensuring robust backend functionality.
Utilizes Shadcn UI for a modern and responsive user interface.
Features a Kanban board for organizing tasks, enhancing productivity.
Ideal for teams looking to streamline their workflow and task assignments.

projects.title: InstaChat
description: A simple messaging system built on the popular React framework.
ViteJs establishes the frontend architecture of the system with client-side routing using Wouter.
Symfony and Mercure form the core of the server-side functionality.
These technologies enable real-time data transmission to the client.

projects.title: CondaAI
description: Conda AI is a project that aims to provide a user-friendly To-Do list application with AI capabilities to improve the overview of tasks and their completion.
The application is built using .Net Maui and utilizes the MVVM pattern for a clean separation of code.
It features a user-friendly interface with a dark mode option, enhancing usability and accessibility.
